notes.text: Ultraviolet radiation spans wavelengths from about 10 nm to 400 nm and is an important component of sunlight although the ozone layer prevents much of it from reaching the earth's surface. While ultraviolet is necessary for the production of vitamin D₂ in the skin, excessive exposure can be harmful, causing skin cancer and genetic mutation

definitions: (of electromagnetic radiation) having a wavelength shorter than that of the violet end of the visible spectrum but longer than that of X-rays.
shortDefinitions: (of electromagnetic radiation) having wavelength shorter than that of violet end of visible spectrum but longer than that of X-rays

definitions: (of equipment or techniques) using or concerned with this radiation
shortDefinitions: using or concerned with ultraviolet radiation

notes.text: Ultraviolet radiation spans wavelengths from about 10 nm to 400 nm and is an important component of sunlight although the ozone layer prevents much of it from reaching the earth's surface. While ultraviolet is necessary for the production of vitamin D₂ in the skin, excessive exposure can be harmful, causing skin cancer and genetic mutation

definitions: the ultraviolet part of the spectrum; ultraviolet radiation.
